attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: Medium or smaller target is grappled and restrained (escape DC 17); Can't use bite again until grapple ends

attacks.name: Tail
attacks.description: One bite and one tail attack to different targets as an Attack action

traits.name: Multiattack
traits.description: The tyrannosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.
